Class EmployeeSalary

java.lang.Object
EmployeeSalary
public class EmployeeSalary extends Object
This class handles the salary calculations for employees, including tax calculations (USC, PRSI, PAYE), loading pay scales and rates from a CSV file, and processing employee data.

It reads employee details from a CSV file, matches their pay scale and salary based on their job category and role, calculates relevant taxes, and computes the after-tax salary.

  • Constructor Details

    • EmployeeSalary

      public EmployeeSalary()

  • Method Details

    • getSalaries

      public static List<String[]> getSalaries()
      Retrieves a list of employee salaries along with their tax details and after-tax salary.

      This method loads the pay scales and rates, processes the employees, calculates taxes, and stores the results.

      Returns:
      an ArrayList<String[]> where each String[] contains employee details, including name, PPS number, job category, role, pay scale, salary, USC, PRSI, PAYE, and after-tax salary.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method that serves as the entry point for the application. It loads the pay scales and rates, processes employee data, and prints out the employee details.

      This method is intended to display employee salary details and tax calculations for each employee.

      Parameters:
      args - command-line arguments (not used in this program).

    • processEmployees

      public static List<Employee> processEmployees() throws IOException
      Processes employee data by reading the CSV file, matching each employee's job category and role to the correct pay scale and salary rate, then calculating taxes and after-tax salary.
      Returns:
      a list of Employee objects containing the processed data.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while reading the CSV file.

    • loadPayScalesAndRates

      public static void loadPayScalesAndRates() throws IOException
      Reads data from ULPayScales.csv and stores the data in the values array. Data in trimmed and converted to lower case to ensure consistency. Stores the scale point of an employee and salary using maps.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • calculateUSC

      public static String calculateUSC(double salary)
      Calculates the USC (Universal Social Charge) tax based on the employee's salary.
      Parameters:
      salary - the employee's salary used to calculate the USC tax.
      Returns:
      the USC tax as a string.

    • calculatePRSI

      public static String calculatePRSI(double salary)
      Calculates the PRSI (Pay Related Social Insurance) tax based on the employee's salary.
      Parameters:
      salary - the employee's salary used to calculate the PRSI tax.
      Returns:
      the PRSI tax as a string.

    • calculatePAYE

      public static String calculatePAYE(double salary)
      Calculates the PAYE (Pay As You Earn) tax based on the employee's salary.
      Parameters:
      salary - the employee's salary used to calculate the PAYE tax.
      Returns:
      the PAYE tax as a string.

    • getPayScale

      public static Integer getPayScale(String department, String role)
      Retrieves the pay scale point for a given department and role.
      Parameters:
      department - the department name (e.g., "admin").
      role - the role within the department (e.g., "manager").
      Returns:
      the pay scale point for the given department and role, or null if not found.

    • getRate

      public static String getRate(String department, String role)
      Retrieves the salary rate for a given department and role.
      Parameters:
      department - the department name (e.g., "admin").
      role - the role within the department (e.g., "manager").
      Returns:
      the salary rate for the given department and role, or null if not found.
